abstract.t: This ID documents the interface between the Mobile Node and theMobility Access Gateway in the context of 3GPP Evolved Packet Corenetworks. The main goal is to support the Netext working group inthe discussions on the MN to AR interface showing how RFC 5213 hasbeen deployed by other SDOs. This document has been inspired byconsiderations expressed in[I-D.gundavelli-netext-extensions-motivation].
